library

This module has a variety of small functions that can be used to execute small tasks associated with the design of mechanical components such as belts and chains, gears, rotating shafts, keys, bearings, welded joints, welded structures, fasteners, etc.

The module is designed to be used in teaching machine element design to second-year mechanical students. To motivate learning of procedures and relevant standards, there are no pushbutton complete designs.

Unless otherwise specified, the formula and data reference is ‘Machine Elements in Mechanical Design’ by Mott.

There is a collection of Excel data files that are accessed by the library. These files arein the data folder. This is not a comprehensive machine design library but sufficient for preparing assignments, examples and exam questions.

xt

This module has functions that can be called upon to generate jupyter notebooks for documenting the mechanical design tasks. It also has functions to create pdf documents

excel

This module has functions to read and write Microsoft Excel files. It uses the python package openpyxl.
